name: A Mafia Gangster Shootout - Shooting Gangs At War
name_original: A Mafia Gangster Shootout - Shooting Gangs At War
description:
It's Big Al's world in Chicagoland and you're out to show your enemies who the BOSS is. Shoot your way through the bad guys and claim back your territory in this high octane, classic shootout.

FEATURES

- Every character unlocked!
- Cool soundtrack.
- Awesome stickman graphics!
